q1.question: How to use the prompt generator to create AI videos?
q1.answer: Just three steps:{br}1) Select your desired video category{br}2) Enter your idea in Quick Mode, or fill in detailed parameters in Professional Mode{br}3) Click the "Generate Prompt" button{br}{br}Our AI will instantly generate professional-grade Sora 2 prompts for you to use. After generating prompts, you can go to the AI Video Generation page to directly generate videos.

q2.question: Can the generated prompts be used directly in Sora 2?
q2.answer: Yes! All generated prompts are fully compatible with the Sora 2 platform. You can directly copy the prompts to the official Sora 2 platform and start generating high-quality videos immediately. Our AI model has been specifically trained to ensure that the generated prompts follow Sora 2 best practices.{br}{br}Want to see more quality examples? Visit Prompt Showcase to view a massive collection of curated prompts.

q3.question: Are there any other features besides prompt generation?
q3.answer: Of course! Sora Tools provides a complete video tool ecosystem:{br}{br}‚Ä¢ Watermark Removal - Remove Sora2 video watermarks with one click{br}‚Ä¢ AI Video Generation - Generate videos directly using prompts{br}‚Ä¢ Prompt Showcase - Browse quality prompt examples{br}{br}Check out Credit Packages for more feature details.
